short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the table of contents in github and make it possible to jump to headings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows the table of contents in github and makes it possible to jump to headings.
This works in pages of markdown file, issue, pull request and wiki.
